metadata.description: Optional user-assigned managed identity resource id
Optional mail recipient address for Maester report notifications
Deploy optional Web App hosting component
Enable Exchange Online connectivity and permissions for Maester
Enable Microsoft Teams connectivity and permissions for Maester
Enable Azure RBAC role assignments for Maester
Optional Web App SKU for hosting report access portal
Enable can-not-delete locks on key resources
Function App hosting plan SKU: FC1 (Flex Consumption), B1 (App Service Basic), Y1 (Consumption)
Optional custom tags merged onto top-level resources

resources.name: [variables('functionAppName')]

properties.notes: Prevents accidental deletion of Maester storage resources.
Prevents accidental deletion of Maester function app.
Prevents accidental deletion of Maester web app resources.
